title: Entity Type Schema
description: A definition of the entity types that can be used in the Query Tool

name.description: The unique name of entity type like User, Loan, Item, etc.

description.description: A description of the entity type

labelAlias.description: The identifier used for a localized label/name for this entity.

private.description: This flag denotes whether the entity type is private or not. Private entity types cannot be accessed by users for querying.

crossTenantQueriesEnabled.description: Indicates if this entity type supports cross-tenant queries

groupByFields.description: Ordered list of fields used in the GROUP BY clause for this entity type

requiredPermissions.description: List of permissions required to query this entity type

filterConditions.description: Filter conditions to be included in the WHERE clause of this entity type

additionalEcsConditions.description: Additional conditions to be included in the WHERE clause of this entity type in ECS environments

deleted.description: Indicates if this entity type is deleted

usedBy.description: List of modules that use this entity type
